```{python}
import os
import shutil

raw_doc = "Pubs"
updated_doc = "Pubs_list"

f = open(f"{raw_doc}.md", "r")
raw = f.read()
raw = raw.split('---',2)[-1]

names_list = ['Knox, S. H.','Skeeter, J.','Lee, S.-C.','Russell, S. J.','Lu, T.-Y.','Ng, D.','Satriawan, T.','Nyberg, M.','Nesic, Z.','Ketler, R']

for name in names_list:
  raw = raw.replace(name,f'**{name}**')

with open(f"{updated_doc}.qmd", "r") as f:

  updated = f.read()
  updated = updated.split('---',2)[1]
  updated = '---' + updated + '---\n' + raw

with open(f"{updated_doc}.qmd", "w+") as f: 

  f.write(updated)

shutil.copy('american-geophysical-union.csl','docs/american-geophysical-union.csl')

shutil.copy('lab_publications.bib','docs/lab_publications.bib')


```
